column1: Kata Robata////For some positive news though
column2: the drinks were decent! I ordered the 99 Problems and she had the lychee drink. They tasted different but in a good way. Also
column3: our waitress was fantastic! I wish I could remember her name. She was very knowledgeable
column5: and although she had a lot of tables to handle
column6: she did a thorough and excellent job explaining the menu and specific items to us. She was attentive and quick on her feet.
